name: The House in the Field
description:
A house in the field is abandoned and broken, but has a haunting history. This short game lets you explore why. In the house, most doors are locked. To find answers, you must find a key to open a door. Behind that door is another key and (most of the time) another piece to the puzzle.

This game has been created as a dissertation piece for Anglia Ruskin University, exploring how the story in a video game can immerse the player. When you have finished the game please take time to complete the questionnaire (it's literally only 8 questions) - a link to which can be found in the informational text document. The game & questionnaire shouldn't take more than 15 minutes :)

Thank you for your time.

Sam
